text: <@U0UHG4VP1>: thanks for that. another topic, I’d like to have Jira and Gerrit linked such that a commit message containing FAB-NNN or STL-NNN (assuming that is the prefix we use) will a) be a hyperlink to the Jira issue from Gerrit and b) will refect in Jira a that the referencing commit/patchset applies to the Jira issue/story.
<@U0UHG4VP1> also, I thought we were going to have a gerrit policy of requiring 2 +2s before merge
